description: This file defines a class TutorAppAgent that manages an AI tutoring agent, including initialization with model parameters, creating the agent with specific configurations, and generating a learning experience based on a search topic. It imports various modules and templates, and contains methods for setting up the agent and creating educational content.

classes.name: TutorAppAgent
classes.description: A central agent class that handles tutoring functionalities, including initializing the AI model, creating the agent, and generating educational content based on search topics.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the TutorAppAgent with model ID and education level, and creates the agent.

methods.name: _create_agent
methods.description: Creates and configures the AI agent with specified parameters, enabling grounding if supported, and setting description and instructions.

methods.name: create_learning_experience
methods.description: Generates a comprehensive learning experience for a given search topic, tailored to the specified or default education level, by constructing a detailed prompt and invoking the agent.
